alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:06PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Garfield County through 500 PM MDT... At 406 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Edwards, or 24 miles west of Jordan, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Edwards, Sand Springs and Steve Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
